plugin.name: RosInterface
plugin.author: federico.ferri.it@gmail.com
plugin.description: This plugin provides an interface with the ROS API

command.name: subscribe
command.description: Subscribe to a topic.

param.name: topicCallback
param.description: name of the callback function, which will be called with a single argument of type table containing the message payload, e.g.: {linear={x=1.5, y=0.0, z=0.0}, angular={x=0.0, y=0.0, z=-2.3}}

param.name: subscriberHandle
param.description: a handle to the ROS subscriber

command.name: shutdownSubscriber
command.description: Unsubscribe the callback associated with this subscriber.

command.name: subscriberTreatUInt8ArrayAsString
command.description: After calling this function, this subscriber will treat uint8 arrays as string. Using strings should be in general much faster that using int arrays in Lua.

command.name: advertise
command.description: Advertise a topic and create a topic publisher.

param.name: publisherHandle
param.description: a handle to the ROS publisher

command.name: shutdownPublisher
command.description: Shutdown the advertisement associated with this publisher.

command.name: publisherTreatUInt8ArrayAsString
command.description: After calling this function, this publisher will treat uint8 arrays as string. Using strings should be in general much faster that using int arrays in Lua.

command.name: publish
command.description: Publish a message on the topic associated with this publisher.

command.name: serviceClient
command.description: Create a service client.

param.name: serviceClientHandle
param.description: a handle to the ROS service client

command.name: shutdownServiceClient
command.description: Shutdown the service client.

command.name: serviceClientTreatUInt8ArrayAsString
command.description: After calling this function, this service client will treat uint8 arrays as string. Using strings should be in general much faster that using int arrays in Lua.

command.name: call
command.description: Call the service associated with this service client.

param.name: result
param.description: the response message, if the call succeeded

command.name: advertiseService
command.description: Advertise a service and create a service server.

param.name: serviceCallback
param.description: name of the callback function, which will be called with a single argument of type table containing the service request payload; it must return another table containing the response

param.name: serviceServerHandle
param.description: a handle to the ROS service server

command.name: shutdownServiceServer
command.description: Shutdown the service server.

command.name: serviceServerTreatUInt8ArrayAsString
command.description: After calling this function, this service server will treat uint8 arrays as string. Using strings should be in general much faster that using int arrays in Lua.

command.name: sendTransform
command.description: Publish a TF transformation between frames.

param.name: transform
param.description: the transformation expressed as a geometry_msgs/TransformStamped message, i.e. {header={stamp=timeStamp, frame_id='...'}, child_frame_id='...', transform={translation={x=..., y=..., z=...}, rotation={x=..., y=..., z=..., w=...}}}

command.name: sendTransforms
command.description: Publish several TF transformations between frames.

command.name: imageTransportSubscribe
command.description: Subscribe to a topic using ImageTransport.

param.name: topicCallback
param.description: name of the callback function, which will be called as: topicCallback(string data, number width, number height)

param.name: subscriberHandle
param.description: a handle to the ROS subscriber

command.name: imageTransportShutdownSubscriber
command.description: Unsubscribe the callback associated with this subscriber using ImageTransport.

command.name: imageTransportAdvertise
command.description: Advertise a topic and create a topic publisher using ImageTransport.

param.name: publisherHandle
param.description: a handle to the ROS publisher

command.name: imageTransportShutdownPublisher
command.description: Shutdown the advertisement associated with this publisher using ImageTransport.

command.name: imageTransportPublish
command.description: Publish a message on the topic associated with this publisher using ImageTransport.

command.name: getTime
command.description: Return the current ROS time (i.e. the time returned by ros::Time::now()).

command.name: getParamString
command.description: Retrieve a string parameter from the ROS Parameter Server.

param.name: defaultValue
param.description: default value returned when parameter does not exist

param.name: exists
param.description: true if the param exists otherwise false

param.name: value
param.description: the value of the requested parameter

command.name: getParamInt
command.description: Retrieve an integer parameter from the ROS Parameter Server.

param.name: defaultValue
param.description: default value returned when parameter does not exist

param.name: exists
param.description: true if the param exists otherwise false

param.name: value
param.description: the value of the requested parameter

command.name: getParamDouble
command.description: Retrieve a double parameter from the ROS Parameter Server.

param.name: defaultValue
param.description: default value returned when parameter does not exist

param.name: exists
param.description: true if the param exists otherwise false

param.name: value
param.description: the value of the requested parameter

command.name: getParamBool
command.description: Retrieve a boolean parameter from the ROS Parameter Server.

param.name: defaultValue
param.description: default value returned when parameter does not exist

param.name: exists
param.description: true if the param exists otherwise false

param.name: value
param.description: the value of the requested parameter

command.name: setParamString
command.description: Set a string parameter in the ROS Parameter Server.

command.name: setParamInt
command.description: Set a integer parameter in the ROS Parameter Server.

command.name: setParamDouble
command.description: Set a double parameter in the ROS Parameter Server.

command.name: setParamBool
command.description: Set a boolean parameter in the ROS Parameter Server.

command.name: hasParam
command.description: Check wether a parameter exists in the ROS Parameter Server.

param.name: exists
param.description: true if the parameter exists, false otherwise

command.name: deleteParam
command.description: Delete a parameter in the ROS Parameter Server.

command.name: searchParam
command.description: Search a parameter in the ROS Parameter Server, looking in the closest namespace.

param.name: found
param.description: true if the parameter has been found

param.name: name
param.description: name of the parameter which has been found
